alfredsnippet.snippet:
Tavris, Carol and Elliot Aronson, Mistakes Were Made (but not by me), A Harvest Book, Harcourt, Inc., 2007, p.43

"All of us are unaware of our blind spots as fish are unaware of the water they swim in, but those who swim in the waters of privilege have a particular motivation to remain oblivious."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Priveleged Have a Particular Motivation to Remain Oblivious
